message.body: Yo
What's up?
Not too much. How're you doing today?
I'm good.. I'm actually about to go in a interview
Very nice. Whereabouts?
And feel free to answer that more vaguely than specifically.
What do u mean whereabouts?
I figured you could interpret it as freely as you wished, but I was thinking either area in which you were interviewing or type of institution.
Oh.. its called bread lounge.. fancy coffee shop in downtown L.A..
Nice. Do you have previous experience as a barista?
Naw I don't.. haha
But let's see what happens
Yeah, you just gotta wow them with your charm. How long have you been in the LA area?
All my life... 27 years
What do u do in life?
Research for money, music and writing for pleasure.
I poetry man.. I write a few things myself
You need to hook me up with the research locations..
What type of research u do?
Language research; this study contacted our office because they're related fields. Do you perform your poetry at all, or just write?
I just write it
I don't know where I will perform them.. I wouldn't mind though
Do you perform yours?
Or what do you write exactly?
Lately I've been writing mostly interviews and stuff like that, journalism-style, but I used to write a lot of fiction as a kid.
Oh I see
Sounds great
So tell me more about this language research? How can I find more info and try to join the study
Well, I'm in Philly and the only studies we run require people to be on site.
Oh ok..
I thought u were here where I am.. cali
How is the weather over there?
In general looking for studies to join (such as the one we're now participating in) can be difficult to find. Have you checked out ICSI?
Naw.. what is ICSI
Weather's holding out for the moment. Supposed to storm. I know that ICSI does some reaesrch that might require participants, not sure tho.
I'd also look into focus groups. They pay real well for little time, although it can be hard to land a spot sometimes.
Oh ok.. I see
Ill check it out
Yeah.. I tried those
No dice, or did you have some luck?
I landed a spot on some..
But some are hard to get into
Yeah, I was trying them for a little while, then I ended up aging out the prime target market. You've still got a few years in the lucrative age range.
So there is a time limit
On?
U said u started aging out..
Sorry.. I fell asleep
Gotta wake up early tomorrow
It was good talking to you.. I'm sure we sent more than 50 messages right? At least to enter the drawing.. haha
Have a good night
Didn't get these till the morning cuz I was asleep: EST. Good talking to you, too.
Sorry about thay
That*
Nah, all good.
So is there also girls on this texting thing.. or just guys? LoL
Should be. I don't know that this is the best platform for meeting them, but they should comoise roughly half of the population.
Oh no.. I don't know about meeting them..
But just to have a convo.. but what's the point if u ain't gonna meet them.. that's true
Right, yeah I don't know what the breakdown's like, but they should be around. Re: earlier statement about aging out of studies:
I was just saying that males aged 15-30 are a prime target audience, so once you hit 30 focus groups don't offer as much.
Oh ok.. gotcha'!
Well.. looks like I have 3 years to go.. haha
I like your vocabulary.. you used a lot of words that I hardly here
Hopefully not in an overly intellectual, douchy way...
Hear*
